Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provides more clarity and is more attentive. You are able to freely query any point of the explanation that is unclear until you are satisfied. The teacher has limited time to attend to all students and may not be able to provide the same level of attention to every student.
